commentary.commentary: A good length delivery just outside off, Warner leaves it alone.
Full and swinging away, Warner defends solidly.
Short and wide, Warner cuts it powerfully through point for FOUR!
Good length and straight, Warner defends to mid-on.
BOWLED! Bumrah with an absolute beauty! Pitches on middle and seams away to clip the top of off stump. Warner beaten all ends up!
Full and straight, Head defends his first ball carefully.
Flighted delivery on middle, Smith works it to long-on for a single.
MASSIVE SIX! Maxwell comes down the track and launches Kuldeep straight over long-on! The ball lands in the second tier!
Swept hard and fine by Maxwell, races away to the boundary for FOUR.
STUMPED! Maxwell comes down the track again but misses a well-flighted googly. Pant whips off the bails in a flash!
Full toss, Kohli drives it through the covers for a couple. Moves to 98.
FOUR! Short and wide, Kohli cuts it past point. That takes him to his century! The stadium erupts!
Yorker length, dug out towards long-on for a couple.
SIX! What a shot! Kohli flicks a full delivery on leg stump over deep square leg for a maximum!
OUT! Kohli skies one to mid-off where Cummins takes a good catch. A magnificent innings comes to an end at 112.
FOUR! Game over! Pandya smashes a full toss through the covers to win the match for India with 9 balls to spare!

highlights.description: David Warner bowled by Jasprit Bumrah
Steven Smith's elegant cover drive for four
Glenn Maxwell stumped by Rishabh Pant off Kuldeep Yadav
Virat Kohli reaches his 48th ODI century
Hardik Pandya's boundary to win the match

commentary.commentary: FOUR! De Kock gets off the mark with a beautiful drive through covers.
Good length on off stump, de Kock defends.
SIX! De Kock goes big! Smashes it over long-on for a maximum!
OUT! De Kock tries to go big again but gets a top edge. Archer takes a good running catch at mid-off.
Bavuma gets off the mark with a single to cover.
Dot ball to end the over. Good comeback by Curran after being hit for 10 in the first three balls.
FOUR! Klaasen sweeps Rashid fine for a boundary.
SIX! What a shot! Klaasen launches Rashid over long-on for a massive six!
Driven through the covers for a couple.
FOUR! Klaasen is on fire! Reverse sweeps for another boundary.
Buttler works it away to deep square leg for two runs.
SIX! Buttler launches Rabada over midwicket! That's his 7th six of the innings!
FOUR! Buttler scoops it over fine leg! Incredible batting!
OUT! Buttler finally falls, caught at long-off. A magnificent innings comes to an end at 89.
Moeen takes a single, bringing Livingstone on strike.
SIX! Livingstone finishes the over with a massive six over deep midwicket!

highlights.description: Quinton de Kock caught by Archer off Curran
Heinrich Klaasen's four consecutive boundaries off Rashid
Jos Buttler's consecutive boundaries off Rabada
Liam Livingstone's six to seal the victory
